game.shortDescription: Overcooked returns with a brand-new helping of chaotic cooking action! Journey back to the Onion Kingdom and assemble your team of chefs in classic couch co-op or online play for up to four players. Hold onto your aprons… it’s time to save the world again!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Overcooked returns with a brand-new helping of chaotic cooking action! Journey back to the Onion Kingdom and assemble your team of chefs in classic couch co-op or online play for up to four players. Hold onto your aprons… it’s time to save the world again!

reviewHighlights.text: 왜 던지냐고, 설거지 안해?, 야 저거 탄다 탄다!!, 길좀 쳐 막지말라고!!, 우리 이 게임 하지말자.
개재미있음. 공부할때보다 더 높은 집중력을 발휘했음. 혼자하면 손가락 개아프고 친구랑 해야함. 확실히 일머리 있는 사람이 플레이 해야하는듯. 친구 피자집에서 일했는데 피자 만드는거 개잘함. 빠릿빠릿함 아무튼 세일할때 하면 재미있는듯
